name: Never stop drifting
description:
Our game is a metaphor for loneliness.

We have chosen to use the concept of non-Euclidean geometry to show that nothing is logical here. We embody an astronaut, consumed by loneliness, cut off from the outside world in his drifting ship. His world has nothing rational anymore, the pieces move by themselves when he is not looking, but something is recurrent : this strange button...

The game is not completely finished, so let us know if you have encountered any bugs, problems, or if you have any relevant remarks. :)

Thank you <3
